M10/1/A1HIN/HP1/HIN/TZ0/XX




       22100129


HINDI A1 – HIGHER LEVEL – PAPER 1
HINDI A1 – NIVEAU SUPÉRIEUR – ÉPREUVE 1
HINDI A1 – NIVEL SUPERIOR – PRUEBA 1

Thursday 13 May 2010 (afternoon)
Jeudi 13 mai 2010 (après-midi)
Jueves 13 de mayo de 2010 (tarde)

2 hours / 2 heures / 2 horas


Instructions to candidates

 Do not open this examination paper until instructed to do so.
 Write a commentary on one passage only.

INSTRUCTIONS DESTINÉES AUX CANDIDATS

 N’ouvrez pas cette épreuve avant d’y être autorisé(e).
 Rédigez un commentaire sur un seul des passages.

INSTRUCCIONES PARA LOS ALUMNOS

 No abra esta prueba hasta que se lo autoricen.
 Escriba un comentario sobre un solo fragmento.




2210-0129                                                                                 4 pages/páginas

naIcao dao ]wrNa ide gae hOM,(1)tqaa(2).[na daonaaoM maoM sao iksaI ek pr vyaa#yaa i-laiKe.

1.

                                                                              P`adUYaNa

            Sahr Apnao baD,o haonao ko Anaupat maoM p`dUiYat hO, p`dUYaNa ko saMbaMQa maoM raoja nae inayama banato hOM ifr BaI p`dUYaNa baZ,ta hI jaa
            rha hO.gahrI ina:Svaasa ko saaqa ]nhaoMnao iKD,kI puna: baMd kr dI.eAr kMiDSnar na hao tao gama- hvaae^M SarIr kao Jaulasaa
            hI do.ipClao baIsa idnaaoM sao vao eAr kMiDSnar kI QaImaI GarGarahT ko baIca rh rho hOM, vah ]sako inayaimat svar ko AByast
            hao cauko hOM, ikMtu ]sa svar kI samaanata naIma kI pi<ayaaoM kI sarsarahT sao vah caah kr BaI vah nahIM kr pato, ijasako
     5      naIcao baOzkr vah BajjaU sao GaMTaoM sauK-duK kI baatoM krto rhto qao.k[- baar [cCa haotI ik BajjaU haota tao doKta ]naka
            baoTa ‘ramaiKlaavanaa’ iktnaa baD,a AadmaI hO.phlao ramaiKlaavana ek CaoTo nagar maoM CaoTa AiQakarI qaa.ijasa idna ]nhoM
            ramaiKlaavana ka p~ imalaa qaa ik Aba vah AiQakarI bana gayaa hO ]nhoM mahsaUsa huAa qaa ik ]nakI tpsyaa safla hao ga[-.
            ]saI idna vah Sahr gayao qao, saaqa maoM dao iklaao GaI lao gayao qao.fD,fD,ahT sao ]nakI tMd`a BaMga hao ga[- qaI, kbaUtr kaonao maoM
            baOza pMK fD,fD,a rha qaa.Atula prsaaoM hI yah safod kbaUtr KrId laayaa qaa, ]sako pMK kTo hue qao, ijasao vah kmaro maoM
     10     CaoD, gayaa qaa.gaaMva maoM ]nako AaMgana maoM gaaOrOyaa ko JauMD ko JauMD ko cahcahayaa krto, kaOvao saubah haoto hI Ama$d ko poD, pr
            baOz kaMva-kaMva krnao lagato.ramaiKlaavana CaoTa qaa tao kaOvaaoM kao KUba raoTI iKlaata qaa. nanha ramaiKlaavana GauTnaaoM ko bala
            cala kr iksaI ku<ao ka kana pkD, laota AaOr ku<aa BaI vahIM psar jaata.]nhaoMnao doKa hO ik SahraoM maoM baccaaoM PlaaisTk ko
            jaanavaraoM sao Kolato hOM AaOr ijasa Gar maoM ku<aa haota hO, vaha^M baccao kI doKBaala Aayaa krtI hO.Syaamalaala ka jaIvana Balao hI
            sauK-sauivaQaaAaoM ko ABaava maoM baIta, ikntu gaaMva ko laaoga jaao sammaana doto qao vahIM ]nhoM svaiga-k AanaMd dota qaa.iSaxaa ka xao~
     15     ]nhaoMnao [sailae caunaa qaa ik ivaVadana ka kao[- p`itdana nahIM qaa AaOr na hI Aaja kI trh ]nhaoMnao iSaxaa kao vyavasaaya samaJaa
            qaa.ramaiKlaavana pZ, rha qaa. baI.e.krnao baad ]nhaoMnao ]saka ivavaah pZ,I-ilaKI laD,kI sao kr idyaa qaa.ramaiKlaavana
            ka Baagya hI qaa ik ]naka pZ,ayaa laD,ka ivaBaaga maoM ]cca AiQakarI qaa.]sanao ramaiKlaavana kao inayaui@t-p~ do idyaa
            qaa.]sako baad ko safr maoM ramaiKlaavana kao iksaI madd nahIM pD,I, vah jaaoD,-taoD, kr Aagao baZ,ta hI gayaa.baabaUjaI,
            caaya laa}^M ? mahosaU nao ]nakI tMd`a BaMga kr dI. phlao jaba ramaiKlaavana CaoTa AiQakarI qaa tao bahU ]naka Qyaana rKtI
     20     qaI, ikMtu Aba vah doKto hOM bahU-baoTo kao ]nasao baat krnao ka samaya nahIM hO.bahU kao doKkr lagata hI nahIM ik yah vahI
            gaa^Mva kI saIQaI-saadI baalaa hO.pit ko str ko Anau$p vah BaI AaQauinaka maoM pirvait-t hao caukI hO.]nakI paotI sauSaIlaa
            tao pUNa-$p sao maaDna- hao caukI hO.ma@Kna-TaosT ko saaqa ]nhaoMnao caaya pI AaOr ramaayaNa laokr bahut hI QaImao svar maoM pZ,nao
            lagao.toja svar maoM pZ,nao sao dUsaraoM kao AsauivaQaa haogaI.phlao vah mahosaU sao baatoM kr ilayaa krto qao, laoikna jaata.ek idna
            ]nhaoMnao bahU ka baD,baD,anaa sauna ilayaa qaa- ‘naaOkraoM ko mau^Mh lagao rhto hOM, [nhoM tao hmaarI [jja,t ka BaI #yaala nahIM ? ]sa idna
     25     sao mahosaU sao BaI bahut kma baatoM krto hOM, jabaik ]nhoM mahosaU sao baat krnao maoM baD,a Apnaapna mahsaUsa haota qaa.gaa^Mva maoM sadOva
            laaogaaoM sao iGaro rhto qao, kao[- na kao[- Aakr baOz hI jaata.ramaiKlaavana kI maa^M kI maaOt ko baad BaI ]nhaoMnao [tnaa Akolaapna
            mahsaUsa nahIM ikyaa qaa, ijatnaa yaha^M mahsaUsa hao rha qaa.]sakI maa^M kI maaOt pr ]nhaoMnao TolaIga`ama ikyaa qaa, ikMtu torhI kao
            hI phu^Mcaa qaa, ‘baD,I ibajaI laa[f hao ga[- hO, @yaa k$^M khIM jaanaa hI nahIM imalata.’ maa^M kI maaOt kI Kbar ko saaqa hI
            raotI-klaptI ]nakI baoTI ‘saaiva~I’ AayaI qaI.ramaKolaavana sapirvaar Aayaa qaa AaOr dUsaro hI idna calaa gayaa qaa.saaiva~I
     30     AaOr ]saka pit rajaond` k[- idna tk $ko qao AaOr jaato samaya kha qaa ik vao ]nako saaqa calakr rho, ikntu ]nhaoMnao manaa
            kr idyaa qaa.idnaaoM ramaiKlaavana gaa^Mva Aayaa qaa tao AaSaa ko ivaprIt tIna-caar idna rha qaa, ipClao ‘baabaUjaI’, Aap hmaaro
            saaqa calakr rhoM yaha^M Aba @yaa hO ? vao jamaIna AaOr Gar kI vyavasqaa ko baaro maoM saaoca hI rho qao tBaI sauroSa nao batayaa qaa,
            baD,o Ba[yaa Gar AaOr jamaIna baocanao kI baat kr rho hOM.ek baar SaMka nao isar ]zayaa qaa ik khIM vao Clao tao nahIM jaa rho hOM,

     ikMtu yah saaocakr KamaaoSa rhoM ik marnao ko baad hO tao saba [saI ka, mauJao @yaa dao va@t kI raoTI AaOr kpD,a caaihe.
  35 ]nakI [cCa saaiva~I kao BaI AaQaa ihssaa donao kI qaI, ikMtu kh nahIM sako qao AaOr ramaiKlaavana sao saba baoca idyaa qaa.
     yaha^M Aakr ]nhoM pta calaa ik ramaiKlaavana nao ]sa pOsao sao ]sanao kar KrId laI qaI. kmaro maoM kbaUtr [Qar-]Qar fudkta
     GaUma rha qaa.kar ka hana- saunakr ]nhaoMnao iKD,kI Kaola kr baahr JaaMka.kla vaalaa laD,ka kar sao baahr JaaMk rha qaa
     AaOr sauSaIlaa kar sao ]tr rhI qaI.baabaUjaI, yao baIbaIjaI ka bvaayaf`oMD hO, mahosaU baaolaa.sauSaIlaa ko kpD,o doKkr ]nakI
     Aa^MKoM Sama- sao Jauk jaatI hO, bahU kao doKkr lagata hO ik vah sauSaIlaa kI maa^M nahIM baD,I bahna hO.kuC saaocakr vah kmaro
  40 sao baahr Aa gae.‘saunaao baoTI !’ ]nhaoMnao sauSaIlaa kao Aavaaja dI.‘@yaa hO ?’ izzkkr $kto hue sauSaIlaa baaolaI. doKao
     baoTI, tuma samaJadar hao, tumhoM Apnao maa^M-baap kI [jja,t ka #yaala rKnaa caaihe, vah samaJaato hue baaolao.sauSaIlaa nao ek
     baar ]nhoM doKa AaOr isar JaTkkr tojaI sao kmaro maoM calaI ga[-.kbaUtr kaonao maoM dubaka baOza qaa, vah BaI Apnao ibastr maoM
     dubak gayao.rat maoM sauSaIlaa ka svar ]nako Aist%va ko TukD,o TukD,o kr rha qaa.‘mammaI, [sa baud\Zo kao @yaa ra[T hO maorI
     p`a[vaoT laa[f maoM iDsTba- krnao ka, maOM samaJadar hU^M, baccaI nahIM.‘maOM samaJaa dU^MgaI ik yaha^M kI raoTI hjama nahIM hao rhI hao
  45 tao ApnaI gaMvaar baoTI ko pasa jaakr rho ? bahU kh rhI qaI.kmaro maoM fD,fD,ahT hu[-.]nhaoMnao doKa kbaUtr kao iballaI
     pkD, lao ga[- qaI.baahr bahU Aba BaI toja svar maoM baD,baD,a rhI qaI.

                                                                                                   saaibar husaOna, navanaIt (navaMbar 1991)

2.

                        baohtr duinayaa ka sapnaa doKto laaoga

                 bahut baD,I iganatI maoM hOM eosao laaoga [sa duinayaa maoM
                 jaao caZ,to saUrja kao krto hOM namaskar
                 jauTato hOM sauK-sauivaQaae^M AaOr pato hOM purskar.
                 bahut baD,I iganatI maoM hOM eosao laaoga
            5    jaao doK kr hvaa ka $K calato hOM.
                 ijaQar baho panaI, ]Qar hI bahto hOM.
                 bahut AiQak iganatI maoM hOM eosao laaoga
                 jaao kYTaoM-saMGaYaao-M sao ktrato hOM
                 krko samaJaaOto bahut kuC pato hOM.
            10   kma nahIM hOM eosao laaogaaoM kI iganatI
                 jaao panao kao p`vaoSa drbaaraoM maoM
                 Apnao rIZ, tk igarvaI rK doto hOM.
                 rIZ,hIna laaogaaoM kI [sa bahut baD,I duinayaa maoM
                 bahut kma iganatI maoM hOM eosao laaoga jaao
            15   Qaara ko iva$w calato hOM
                 kYTaoM-saMGaYaao-M sao jaUJato hOM.
                 samaJaaOtaoM kao nakarto hOM
                 Apnaa saUrja Kud ]gaato hOM.
                 Balao hI kma hOM
            20   pr hOM ABaI BaI eosao laaoga
                 jaao baohtr duinayaa ka sapnaa doKto hOM
                 AaOr bacaae rKto hOM ApnaI rIZ,
                 rIZhIna laaogaaoM kI BaID, maoM.

                                                                    sauBaaYa naIrva, pirkqaa (jaulaa[- Agast 2008)
